title: wich 3 items gain you the most AP?
body:
hello, i was playing leblanc  last week, and she's good early game, but sucks late game.
i wanted to solve that with 2 rod of ages and 1 spirit visage.
but then i have 3 item slots over for my AP items.
wich 3 items give u most AP???

replies.body:
{{item:3165}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} ({{item:3157}}  or {{item:3285}}  or {{item:3026}} )
something like this, depending on situation and if you have or not cdr runes etc. an early zhonya instead of abyssal if you are losing to yasuo or something

don't build roa on her, don't build rylai and lyandry's either

First of all, please don't build 2 rod of ages or spirit visage on Leblanc.

To answer your question, {{item:3089}} (don't buy it until you have 3 items), {{item:3040}} (please don't buy this on Leblanc) and {{item:3285}} /{{item:3165}} /{{item:3027}} (once fully stacked; DON'T BUY 2 OF THEM)

Wha- 
You rarely ever need to stack items. Times you NEED to is equivalent to times Ivern doesn't smile. The reason to why you don't stack items is because their passives and actives are not stackable.
so does that mean u can only stack items with no UNIQUE?
